name: Bunnies vs Farmer
description:
I had a dream a few days ago (By the time I made the game) of a game similar to Counter-Strike, called "Bunnies vs Farmers". The objective was for bunnies to steal carrots from the farm while farmers prevent them by shooting at them.

Of course, I was one of the two bunnies while the farmers were a bunch of my close real-life friends, who wants to shoot me for reasons (Both in game and probably real life too).

Because making this dream joke game a multiplayer one is very expensive in terms of time and efforts (And this is a joke game, I shouldn't take it very seriously, I just want to get it out of my head), I decided to make it a "Bunnies vs Farmer", where you have to prevent bunnies from stealing your carrots by shooting at them with a confetti gun in 100 seconds in darkness because the bunnies attack at night.

Please don't take this game seriously, no bunnies were hurt while making this game. I'm as confused as you are, trust me.

If you, for some reason, feel the need to contact me, catch me on:

Twitter: @Q8GEEK

Instagram: @Q8GEEK
